last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: When a man is found dead on the streets of Cambridge, Alphy and Geordie begin to unravel clues that leads them to a shocking revelation.

name: Grantchester
overview: In 1953 at the hamlet of Grantchester, Sidney Chambers—a charismatic, charming clergyman—turns investigative vicar when one of his parishioners dies in suspicious circumstances.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Set against the backdrop of the real hamlet of Grantchester, the drama focuses upon the life of Sidney Chambers, a charismatic, charming clergyman who turns investigative vicar when one of his parishioners dies in suspicious circumstances.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: It’s 1958 and trouble is brewing in the Cambridgeshire village of Grantchester. Reverend Will Davenport relishes his role as a firebrand vicar, willing to rock the boat and challenge conventions to help people. But the very role he loves puts him at odds with his own ideals when his kind-hearted curate, Leonard Finch is caught up in a scandal.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: With a new decade just around the corner, the question of what the future holds is on everyone’s minds, not least Will’s, but before the 50s roll over into the swinging sixties there are some crimes to solve and some life-changing decisions to be made that might change life in Grantchester forever.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the village of Grantchester, the funeral of a parishioner leads vicar Sidney Chambers to become involved in a murder investigation - and a confrontation with the local police.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When Amanda's engagement ring is stolen on the night a murder is committed, Sidney and Geordie investigate whether there is a connection between the two crimes.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sidney gives up alcohol and tries to renew his focus on clerical duties, but is dragged into another case when there are mysterious deaths in the village.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A fire in the village leads Sidney to another investigation. Meanwhile, a family crisis causes Geordie to become distracted and detached from his job.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Sidney and Geordie go for a night out at Johnny Johnson's London jazz club, but soon discover that policemen and clergymen can never truly be off duty.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: With Amanda and Guy's wedding fast approaching, Sidney is thrown into crisis - is he truly cut out for life as the vicar of Grantchester?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Grantchester vicar Sidney Chambers is accused of a terrible crime, unmasking the real culprit sends shockwaves through the community.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Sidney and Geordie investigate a Cambridge lecturer's fatal fall from the college spires.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A young man confesses to Sidney and Geordie that he attacked and killed his landlord.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Sidney is summoned to perform an exorcism at a stable owner's home.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Will Gary go to the gallows? Will Geordie go to prison? Are Sidney and Geordie’s crime fighting days over? The case of a suspicious death takes a surprising turn.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: With Sam missing, Sidney and Geordie are forced to investigate a crime together.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Sidney Chambers begins receiving sinister anonymous phone calls, he realises he is connected to a series of murders targeting respected figures in the community. Leonard bonds with Hilary as she cares for her dying father, while Geordie's investigation of the killings leads him to a mysterious home for people with disabilities.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When several villagers become ill at the local cricket match, Geordie and Sidney must determine if it was an accident, or something more sinister.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sidney and Geordie struggle to determine the connection between a murder and a number of post office robberies.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: When a young woman’s death is covered up, Sidney and Geordie try to hold those responsible accountable for their actions.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Sidney arrives at a Romany camp, but when someone is killed, he is prime suspect.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: When a little boy is abducted, personal pressures on Sidney and Geordie come to a head.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Sidney and Geordie investigate when a man is stabbed during a talk by a Civil Rights activist, sparking racial tensions.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Sidney discovers he was the last person to see a woman alive during a drunken night while Geordie becomes increasingly alarmed at his friend's behaviour.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Geordie is called to investigate an apparent break-in at a computer laboratory. When the head of the lab keels over and dies from mercury poisoning, Geordie suspects foul play.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: As Will is preparing to be installed as the new vicar Geordie persuades him to involve himself in a case involving a young uncommunicative boy with blood on his hands.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: An unexpected phone call summons Will back home, and he asks Geordie for his help: Will’s father has got himself into some trouble. When one vicious beating leads to a grisly murder at a sprawling ancestral home, scandal threatens to engulf the Davenport Family, and life will never be the same for Will again.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Will, reeling from his family tragedy and daunted by the choice he now faces, seeks distraction in Geordie’s world. A curious new case unfolds: the murder of a Teddy Boy at a dance hall, which Geordie concludes is proof that the country’s truly gone to the dogs.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When a student from a prestigious all-female college is found dead, Will and Geordie must infiltrate the murky world of campus politics and university societies.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Will and Leonard witness a deadly and deliberate hit-and-run in Grantchester. Geordie traces the car to a pair of decidedly dysfunctional brothers whose house lies far off the beaten path. The victim's wife, his employee and the two brothers are all damaged characters caught in a web of lies and betrayals, and it’s not just secrets that are hiding within the brothers' grounds.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After a bumpy start to their relationship, Will and journalist Ellie go on their first date with a trip to the ‘flicks’. But a scream from the projection booth cuts the romance short as they discover a brutal murder has taken place within the cinema.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A streaker is found dead, sparking an unusual case for Will and Geordie that draws them into the world of experimental psychotherapy and hallucinogens.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: When two boys are found near death, locked up together in the boxing ring, Will must face up to his own part in the tragedy in his greatest test of faith yet.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: When a woman is found dead, laid out in the shape of a crucifix on Jesus Green, Will and Geordie discover the ring on her finger proves she was married to God.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A much-needed summer break at a vacation resort takes an unexpected turn for Will and Geordie when the camp owner is found dead in suspicious circumstances.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Will and Geordie negotiate a complex family dispute that may be connected to the murder of the head of a local adoption agency. Meanwhile, a sinister letter arrives for Leonard.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Will and Geordie are drawn into local politics when the death of a councilor prompts a parish election. An allegation against Leonard rocks life at the vicarage to its core.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: When an American airman dies in the police station, a quiet late shift turns into a challenging night for Will and Geordie. Leonard and Daniel reassess their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Will and Geordie investigate an audacious bank robbery, which sees Geordie unexpectedly cross paths with an old friend from his army days.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: When the leader of a student group falls to her death during a protest, Will and Geordie are drawn into campus politics. The Bishop introduces a new face at the vicarage.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Leonard goes to Will and Geordie to ask for their help when someone he knows is suddenly accused of murder.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: When a successful music producer is murdered, Geordie finds himself implicated in the investigation, and forced to consider whether his army buddy Johnny could be the killer.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: It’s 1958 and trouble is brewing in the Cambridgeshire village of Grantchester. Reverend Will Davenport relishes his role as a firebrand vicar, willing to rock the boat and challenge conventions to help people. But the very role he loves puts him at odds with his own ideals when his kind-hearted curate, Leonard Finch is caught up in a scandal.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Will and Geordie investigate the apparent murder of Lord Edmund Fitzgerald.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Will and Geordie investigate when a man is found dead with an unusual neck wound.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A vagrant is found dead in the doorway of Leonard's cafe.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A member of Will's congregation is found murdered just before a church fundraising event.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: There's a murder at a local old folks' home and two of its elderly residents go missing.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Geordie and Will realise that they may have sent the wrong man to prison for murder.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: With a new decade just around the corner, the question of what the future holds is on everyone’s minds, not least Will’s, but before the 50s roll over into the swinging sixties there are some crimes to solve and some life-changing decisions to be made that might change life in Grantchester forever.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After a fun-filled charity motorbike race, a young biker is found dead. Will and Geordie struggle to work out who would want to hurt a gifted young man.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of a fatal accident, Will is devastated to be the cause while Geordie rushes to exonerate his friend.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: At one of Cambridge’s most prestigious colleges, a man is murdered and a valuable painting is stolen, leaving Geordie to determine if the two crimes are linked.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Leonard is devastated when a halfway house resident is found dead. The man confessed suicidal thoughts to Will, but is this suicide or murder?

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Geordie is placed on desk duty as Elliot contrives to force him to resign. The next murder case is handed to Larry, who struggles but wisely enlists the help of Miss Scott.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Will has disappeared, but with Bonnie about to give birth, Geordie must find him and bring him to his senses before it is too late.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Will and Geordie investigate the mysterious death of a circus performer. Will receives a surprising offer that makes him question his life in Grantchester.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: An abandoned baby is discovered on the same day that a hotel manager is found dead. Things are complicated further when Geordie is blindsided by Will's news.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Geordie and new vicar Alphy Kottaram get off on the wrong foot but soon find themselves teaming up to investigate the murder of a local landowner.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Alphy is invited to a party at a country manor, where he hopes to raise funds for the ailing church. The evening’s frivolities are cut short when a body is found in the basement.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A murder at Esme’s office sends shockwaves through the Keating family. Alphy’s meeting with the bishop fails to go as planned.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Alphy and Geordie’s investigation into the murder of an archaeologist uncovers a tangled web of betrayal and deceit.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Alphy discovers that a woman he knows has gone missing. When her friend is murdered, Alphy and Geordie race to find the answers.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: When a man is found dead on the streets of Cambridge, Alphy and Geordie begin to unravel clues that leads them to a shocking revelation.
